abilities.description: Whenever you attack a hero or are attacked by any unit, the bonus 14 HP regen is lost and the movement speed bonus is reduced to 40 for 13 seconds.

additionalInformation: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of Boots of Speed-based items do not stack.
Stacks with all other movement speed bonus.
The health regeneration of multiple Tranquil Boots-based items fully stacks.
name: Tranquil Boots
tips: Remember that the Tranquil Boots' health regeneration doesn't stop or reset the cooldown if you are casting a spell. You can get a Soul Ring and spam long range abilities and keep the regeneration active.
Right Click attacks disable the health regeneration, if you drop the boots you will keep it active or not reset their cooldown.
If you have invisibility you can stay in experience range while you regenerate your health safely. Be careful that the enemy doesn't have detection (e.g. Sentry Ward or Dust of Appearance.
The item is great for roamers, rapidly restoring a hero's health while moving to another lane.
